thread.title: The best moments from Ryan Reynolds' Hasty Pudding ceremony
thread.title_full: The best moments from Ryan Reynolds' Hasty Pudding ceremony

author: USA TODAY
title: The best moments from Ryan Reynolds' Hasty Pudding ceremony
text:
The best moments from Ryan Reynolds' Hasty Pudding ceremony Jayme Deerwester , USA TODAY 12:33 p.m. ET Feb. 4, 2017 
When Harvard's Hasty Pudding theater club announced Ryan Reynolds would be their 2017 Man of the Year, we knew the photos would not disappoint. And they did not. They put him in a Deadpool bra 
We bet he appreciates the full coverage and support that Deadpool bra offers. (Photo: Charles Krupa, AP) And evaluated his lap-dancing skills 
Baum-chicka-baum-baum. Made him dig through trash in search of a green lantern 
He's never going to live that movie down. 
“This is actually worth more than all the revenue of the film,” Reynolds informed the audience. (Photo: Charles Krupa, AP) And then gave him a hammer and ordered him to pound the daylights out of that green lantern 
"If I had a hammer..." (Photo: Charles Krupa, AP) But the scariest stunt of all? Mocking Patriots QB Tom Brady on Super Bowl weekend 
People reports Reynolds sounded genuinely worried about that one, protesting, "You know we're in Boston , right?" 
"Take that, Jack Russell terrorist!" (Photo: Charles Krupa, AP) Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2k7FaxB Most Popular
